text: Mary Rosamund Haas (January 12, 1910 â€“ May 17, 1996) was an American linguist. She studied Native American Indian languages. She also studied Thai and historical linguistics. ==Early life== Haas attended high school in Richmond, Indiana, and later Earlham College. == Related pages == *List of women linguists ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1996 deaths Category:People from Richmond, Indiana Category:University of California, Berkeley faculty Category:American linguists Category:Writers from Indiana Category:Yale University alumni
